QuestData.Title: The Thrill of Discovery
QuestData.Description: What a find! And somehow it's all remained untouched by plunderers...$b$bListen, $n. I need to document this site before we disturb anything. While I do, why don't you have a look around - you know, explore a bit. You've earned it.$b$bKeep your eyes open for anything unusual.$b$bOh! And please... don't break anything, ok?
QuestData.LogDescription: Explore the Chamber of the Stars.
QuestData.RewardText: Your exploration of the Chamber of the Stars has yielded more questions than answers...
